sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Running this script will activate polaris theme for agent chat</description> <name>EasyInstall Activate polaris config Chat</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[ gs.info("Check and update polaris theme on agent chat"); new sn_hr_sp.EmployeeCenterEasyInstall().checkAndUpdateAgentConfig();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-10-15 00:36:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e6ead68c739b30106d1f57903bf6a71b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>EasyInstall Activate polaris config Chat</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e6ead68c739b30106d1f57903bf6a71b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-10-15 00:36:10</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
